{{also|女儿红}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=女儿红|type=21}}

===Etymology===
In the [[Jiangnan]] area, this type of wine was traditionally brewed and buried when a daughter is born and was taken out at the daughter's wedding banquet.
